flawed_nl_solution:
The necklace stand needs another 12 – 5 = <<12-5=7>>7 necklaces.
This will cost the store 7 * 4 = $<<7*4=28>>28.
The ring display needs another 30 – 18 = <<30-18=15>>15 rings.
This will cost the store 15 * 10 = $<<15*10=150>>150.
The bracelet display needs another 15 – 8 = <<15-8=7>>7 bracelets.
This will cost the store 7 * 5 = $<<7*5=35>>35.
In total, the store needs to pay 28 + 150 +35 = $<<28+150+35=213>>213.
#### 213

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 15. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
